The claim originated from a social media: 2. The Whole Foods Market grocery chain responded to the claim by stating that the pictured sign had not appeared in the window of any of their stores.
The sign requesting the use of non: gendered language was actually posted by Monash Wholefoods, an Australian business not affiliated with the American Whole Foods Market organic grocery chain.
